definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To lay , spread , or apply (something) over or across (something else); to overspread.
examples: She will now overlay the crust with fruit.
She will now overlay fruit on top of the crust.

definitions.definition: To overwhelm ; to press excessively upon.
( transitive , now rare , archaic ) To lie over (someone, especially a child) in order to smother it; to suffocate. [from 14th c.]
( transitive , printing ) To put an overlay on.
( transitive , gambling ) To bet too much money on.
